properties.areaDesc: S of Cape Lookout NC to Surf City NC out to 20 nm; S of Oregon Inlet NC to Cape Hatteras NC out to 20 nm; S of Cape Hatteras NC to Ocracoke Inlet NC out to 20 nm; S of Ocracoke Inlet NC to Cape Lookout NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 17 at 2:49AM EST until February 17 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts to 25 kt and 5 to 6
foot seas.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Oregon Inlet to Surf City.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING
